# Hypothermia (Spell)
## Overview
[[Evocation Spells|Evocation]] \[[[Cold Spells|cold]]]

**Level:** [[4th Level Cleric Spells|Cleric 4]], [[3rd Level Druid Spells|Druid 3]]

**BoXM:** [[BoXM 8th-Level Cleric Spells List|Cleric 8]], [[BoXM 6th-Level Druid Spells List|Druid 6]]

**Casting Time:** 1 standard action

**Components:** V, S

**Range:** Close (25 ft. + 5 ft./2 levels)

**Target:** One creature

**Duration:** Instantaneous

**Saving Throw:** Fortitude partial

**Spell Resistance:** Yes

**Source:** Spell Compendium (WotC), pg. 118

*The fighter drops to her knees, her face pale and a bluish cast to her lips and fingers. A cloud of frosted breath escapes her lips as she whispers, “So... c-c-cold...”*

The subject takes 1d6 points of cold damage per caster level (maximum 10d6) and becomes [[Fatigued|fatigued]]. A successful Fortitude save halves the damage and negates the fatigue.
